channel.title: privacy on MaTTeo's Dlog
channel.description: Recent content in privacy on MaTTeo's Dlog

item.title: What is a Dlog?
item.description: The article answers the question of “what exactly is a “Dlog”? No this is not a typo. Blogs are so Web2. A Dlog, is a concatenation of Decentralized and Blog. Wow! Real original. What is interesting is that at the time of this writing Googling Dlog did not return anything remotely close to a distributed or decentralized web log. As far as I know, this is the first documented use of Dlog in the web3 context.
